title: Horrible Lag HELP
body: I decided to come back to league after a while but i noticed that something wasnt right. In my first games my mouse was acting weird and lagging, then my fps started dropping from 120 to 80 to 60 and now all i see are pictures. Strange thing is that my fps counter says 120 fps and my ping is 50. League is now making my whole pc lag i cant even alt tab out of the game without it starting to crash. I turned off every single program that is not league but this didnt help. Ive never had such a horrible lag in league before even when i had an old potato pc! I had to leave a game cause i just couldnt do ANYTHING even pressing escape was taking 10 years to load! Help? D:

replies.body: It sounds like your pc is really having some troubles running league now for some reason. Sometimes out of date drivers can cause some really awkward interactions with the game so check for any updates along with the rest of the steps in our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting).
